channel.title: Adding text in multiple files?
channel.description: Is there such a program that allows you to add some text in multiple files ? I need it for a website i'm making. I need to put a script in every page(it would take forever if i did it one document at a time)

item.title: Adding text in multiple files?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Man, suck.

If you’re using PHP, I just create an initial template file:

[code]

<?php echo getTitle(); ?> <?php echo getBody(); [/code]

Then make files for index.php, contact.php, etc., whatever you need, overriding the functions in the script.

[code]

<?php function getTitle() { return "The Title"; } function getBody() { return "Body content"; } include('inc.index.php'); } ?>[/code]

And that will present the data, and the analytics code will be on every page.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding text in multiple files?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:9, topic:259734”][quote author=Ske link=topic=342976.msg2650226#msg2650226 date=1233491338]
Cookies, i don’t want to add it in the beginning, i want an option that tells me: from this line => to this line

sanga, the site is all ready, i just want to add a simple code in all 34 or so pages.
[/quote]
are they built off a template? if they are you can edit the template and it edits all of them[/quote]
ooooh

No

item.title: Adding text in multiple files?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:7, topic:259734”]If your code is <50 lines you could keep using

[code]
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine()
WriteStuff.WriteLine(Stuff)[code]

That would type something on the tenth line[/code][/code][/quote]
Appreciate your help but that’s far too complicated for me.
Isn’t there a program with a nice GUI that does this all for you?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding text in multiple files?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If you want to add text at the beginning of file a simple *.vbs Script would work.
You can jst repeat this but with different files.

Dim Stuff, myFSO, WriteStuff
Stuff = "Whatever you want written"

Set myFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set WriteStuff = myFSO.OpenTextFile("yourtextfile.txt", 8, True)
WriteStuff.WriteLine(Stuff)
WriteStuff.Close
SET WriteStuff = NOTHING
SET myFSO = NOTHING

Read full topic
